name: Bernadette Flynn
introduction: She was born on August 1st 1979 in Nenagh, County Tipperary, Ireland. She is famous for her dancing in Lord of the Dance, and Feet of Flames. She has loved dancing all her life, and is the possessor of six world titles and seven All-Ireland titles. In 1996, she came in first in the World Irish Dancing championships, and joined Michael Flately and Lord of the Dance shortly thereafter, playing the role of Saorise (Gaelic for “freedom”). She is married to Damien O’Kane who was also a member of the Lord of the Dance troupe.
